document.name: ModuleDocument
document.documentation: Non-persistent document used to store a selection of a document belonging to a specific module. This allows it to be used in a lookupDescription, e.g. Control Panel - Generate Test Data, or when refreshing documents as part of DataMaintenance.

boolean.name: include
boolean.documentation: Used to indicate if this document is to be included when refreshing as part of DataMaintenance.
